the <S%G68>field<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1161>world;<s%> and the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom;<s%> and the <S%G2215>darnel<s%> weeds <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the evil <S%G4190>one.<s%>
